section.p: Initialize the instance before calling this method.
Initialize the instance before calling this method.

plentry.pd: Sets the log files that the SDK outputs. Relevant links:

ul.li:
0: Success.
-1(ERR_FAILED): A general error occurs (no specified reason).
-2 (ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT): The parameter is invalid.
-7(ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED): The SDK is not initialized. Check whether `context` is properly set.
-22(ERR_RESOURCE_LIMITED): The resource is limited. The SDK fails to allocate resources because your app uses too many system resources or system resources are insufficient.
-101(ERR_INVALID_APP_ID): The App ID is invalid.
